content.rendered:
Payroll Administrator | Tulsa, OK
  • Local Engineering Company looking for an experienced Payroll Administrator
  • Ideal candidate should have 5+ years payroll administration for a multi-state environment
  • Experience with in house production of payroll/reports
  • Strong communication skills and detail oriented
  • JD Edwards experience a PLUS!
  • Must have Associate Degree in Accounting or Business
  • $40-50K BOE
  • Great Opportunity
